original_text: On the same day, we chose men to take care of the rooms where they stored the people's gifts. Those gifts to God were the first fruits from the harvest and the tithes. They had to bring these gifts from the fields near each city. They read this in the law. They were gifts for the Levites and the priests, as God's Law commanded. The people of Judah were happy to help the priests and Levites who served God. On the same day, we chose men to take care of the rooms where they stored the people's gifts. Those gifts to God were the first fruits from the harvest and the tithes. They had to bring these gifts from the fields near each city. They read this in the law. They were gifts for the Levites and the priests, as God's Law commanded. The people of Judah were happy to help the priests and Levites who served God.
korean_text: 그 날에 사람을 세워 곳간을 맡기고 제사장들과 레위 사람들에게 돌릴 것 곧 율법에 정한 대로 거제물과 처음 익은 것과 십일조를 모든 성읍 밭에서 거두어 이 곳간에 쌓게 하였노니 이는 유다 사람이 섬기는 제사장들과 레위 사람들로 말미암아 즐거워하기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: to take care of the rooms
where they stored the people's gifts
were the first fruits from the harvest
They had to bring these gifts
from the fields near each city
They read this in the law
They were gifts for the Levites and the priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 레위 사람들과 제사장들을 위한 선물이었습니다

sentences.original_text: The people of Judah were happy
to help the priests and Levites
